name: WINTERS
description:
Short story about a group of people taking refuge in an abandoned house during a blizzard.

This is another submission for the Winter VN Jam 2021. 'Stevens' was my other entry which is about as different from this as it could possibly be and can be played here if interested.

I was going to make this playable in the browser as well, but image loading and audio delay completely ruined what little of the experience there is. I may come back to this down the track and try to optimise it enough to work. But for now, download only unfortunately.
